### Data Camp
The first [Data Camp](https://www.datacamp.com/){target="_blank"} module is due next Wednesday and covers the basics of R. In particular, the sections are:

- Intro to basics
- Vectors
- Matrices
- Factors
- Data frames
- Lists

As noted last week, there is a lot on there but please refer to the [syllabus](/syllabus/) for the grading policy regarding those tasks. Just remember, this is not a programming class!
